title: Westfield High School seniors recreate a picture from the past
body: Westfield HIgh School seniors recreate a picture from the past.Westfield High School seniors who attended Lincoln School’s inaugural kindergarten classes in 2008-09 recently gathered outside of Westfield High School for a special commemorative photo session.Students were photographed in their original Lincoln kindergarten class sections to help create “Then and Now” pages for the WHS 2021 Weather Vane yearbook. Pictured are former members of Linda Steele’s afternoon kindergarten class.Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
